_header: Against my fellows that I have spoken
Subjects: speech, advice concerning; tongue, destructive power of; translations; sermons, verse in
_description: A speaker bewails that backbiting has lended him in hell — one quatrain following the Latin, Lingua calet igne, iam inheret mosibus ori…

NLS18721.Transcription:
Aȝen my felawes þat I haue spoken& with my tungge wroth
                    hem woIn endeles fir it is nou wrokenAllas, þat euere spak I
                    so
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 13.
